name: reincarnation
content:

[ U ] the belief that a dead person's spirit returns to life in another body: Hindus and Buddhists believe in reincarnation.
[ C ] a person or animal in whose body a dead person's spirit returns to life: He believes he's a reincarnation of Julius Caesar.
